Ved Stranden 10 Review | Bon Appetit

But in summer everyone’s drinking by the canal. It’s heaven.ORDER THE: wines you’ve never heard of. It’s a choose-your-own-adventure kind of place. The knowledgeable team will help you find that perfect glass (or bottle) to pair with your charcuterie and croque monsieur. New to natural wine? The Wednesday tastings are a good place to start. And on Mondays a different visiting chef will fill the big copper pot with something delicious. Help yourself until it runs out.THE VIBE IS: scruffy (but studied) chic.  The corner canalside spot still feels like the centuries-old storefront it once was, but stroll back and you’ll find midcentury furniture from Jean Prouvé. Off-duty and visiting chefs and wine nerds mix with design-driven locals.PRACTICAL STUFF: Open Monday to Saturday from noon to 10 p.m. Closed Sunday.—Christine MuhlkeWE ALSO LOVEVinskabetIndulge your inner wine geek at this breezy Nørrebro bar.AncestraleIn Vesterbro, a cool little wine bar (and a relief to your wallet) Den VandretteGet your L’Anglore fix at this sunny Indre By wine barExplore City GuidesAtlantaAustinBostonCharlestonChicagoCopenhagenLas VegasLondonLos AngelesMexico CityMiamiMontrealNew OrleansNew YorkParisPhiladelphiaPortlandSan FranciscoSeattleTokyoTorontoVancouverWashington, D.C.GET THE MAGAZINEBA LogoBon appetitSUBSCRIBESign up for Updates on the Bon AppétitCity GuidesSign UpWill be used in accordance with our user agreement and privacy policyBA LogoBon appetitSubscription FAQsMastheadNewsletter SignupAccessibility HelpRSS FeedsSite MapCondé Nast StoreCareersBon Appétit Media KitDo Not Sell My Personal InformationCondé NastFood Innovation Group: Bon Appétit and Epicurious© 2022 Condé Nast.
